replies.author: Hilbrand

replies.bodyText: Ups, I pushed the changes before writing my "longer" message, sorry. Yes, I have increased the timeout on purpose, because for really complex devices 5 seconds is not enough. That is also the timeout value that was set before #7760, so nothing unexpected. I really hope that this PR can "fix" the Homie bug that we've been suffering from for so long, and I'm really sorry for all my trial and errors, I thought that it would be easier to solve, but it seems that it wasn't true 😞
